about.description: A flake8 extension that checks for blind, catch-all except statements
about.summary: A flake8 extension that checks for blind, catch-all except statements

name: flake8-blind-except
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "flake8-blind-except" %}
{% set version = "0.1.1" %}
{% set sha256 = "aca3356633825544cec51997260fe31a8f24a1a2795ce8e81696b9916745e599" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 1
  script: python -m pip install --no-deps --ignore-installed .

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python
    - pep8

test:
  imports:
    - flake8_blind_except

about:
  home: https://github.com/elijahandrews/flake8-blind-except
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: '{{ environ["RECIPE_DIR"] }}/LICENSE'
  summary: 'A flake8 extension that checks for blind, catch-all except statements'
  description: |
    A flake8 extension that checks for blind, catch-all except statements
  doc_url: https://github.com/elijahandrews/flake8-blind-except
  dev_url: https://github.com/elijahandrews/flake8-blind-except

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - cshaley
    - sannykr
